entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
